caption.p: Effect of pretreatment with naloxone on the antinociceptive activity induced by administration of EOZC in formalin pain response in rats
Data are expressed as MeanÂ±SEM (n=8). *P<0.05: Compared with vehicle treated group. #P<0.05: Compared with EOZC (20 mg/kg) the test group. EOZC: Essential Oil of Ziziphora Clinopodioides.
